title: Attendify
description: Attendify is a privacy-first membership management app designed for gyms, sports academies, tuition centers, and facilities with recurring members. Featuring QR-based attendance, automated fee reminders, income–expense tracking, and a powerful business intelligence dashboard, it streamlines operations while safeguarding user data through a patent-pending privacy architecture. Built for speed and scalability, Attendify delivers a sub-1-second load time and robust backend reliability.

title: Author Portfolio
description: A visually captivating author portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to showcase published books and connect readers directly to purchase links on Amazon and Flipkart. Optimized for 100% Lighthouse SEO and accessibility scores, the site elevated the author’s Google search ranking and boosted book sales through credibility-building testimonials and seamless ad campaign integration.

title: Avittam Homes Website
description: Revamped the official website for Avittam Homes, a real estate developer, with a modernized UI, improved performance, and SEO optimization. The redesign maintained the existing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP stack while significantly enhancing lead conversion potential and visual appeal. Delivered with 99.9% uptime, the site offers a smoother browsing experience aligned with the brand’s premium image.

title: Landing Page for CA Firm
description: Developed a professional online presence for KMJ & Co., a Chartered Accountancy firm, with a focus on on-page SEO to position them as the top CA firm in Ambattur. The site features WhatsApp integration for instant communication and Google Sheets automation via App Script for real-time lead capture from forms. Achieved Lighthouse scores of 100 in SEO and Best Practices.

title: MedicalData Project
description: A confidential healthcare AI initiative involving the development of machine learning models and LLM-powered insights for predictive analytics on sensitive medical datasets. Extensive data cleaning and preprocessing ensured model reliability, with a strong focus on minimizing false positives and false negatives. Hosted securely on a local server to comply with strict data privacy standards.

title: Hazlo Project
description: A confidential cross-platform mobile application developed using React Native and Firebase, built as an MVP to validate market fit for a sports industry solution. Optimized for production deployment on both Android and iOS, the app delivers a smooth user experience, intuitive navigation, and reliable backend performance to support initial user testing and feedback cycles.

title: FlintM Website
description: Developed the official website for Flintim, a marketing agency, with a strong emphasis on brand storytelling and visual impact. Delivered a custom video-based hero creative designed to instantly engage visitors, alongside a sleek, high-performance interface. With Lighthouse scores above 90% in SEO and performance and 100% in best practices, the site effectively showcases client results, ROAS, and case studies—building trust and credibility.

title: Mun Website
description: Revamped the official website for a Model United Nations (MUN) company, enhancing its professionalism and appeal to schools and MUN enthusiasts. Built on WordPress, the redesign included high-quality Canva-designed visuals to strengthen brand identity and improve event promotion. Achieved 100% performance, 90%+ SEO, and top scores in best practices and accessibility.

title: Myndz Project
description: Developed a dynamic portfolio website for Myndz Badminton Academy, showcasing star players at national and international levels, coach profiles, parent testimonials, and the academy’s values. Integrated Instagram feed and media gallery to highlight activities and achievements, building trust and brand credibility.

title: Plant Species Classification
description: Developed an AI-powered platform to detect and recognize indigenous medicinal plants of India, providing details on their medicinal value and culinary usage. Trained on a dataset of 2,626 plant species (including leaves, flowers, roots, stems, bark, and fruits), the system utilized ResNet50, MobileNetV2, and VGG16 CNN models, achieving 95% accuracy through stochastic weight averaging. Integrated GPT-3 with context-enriched data from web scraping to enable real-time Q&A about plants.

title: Loan Approval System
description: A confidential fintech AI solution built to predict loan approval likelihood using historical datasets of approved and rejected applications. The system employed a supervised learning model to deliver 85% accuracy, with low false positives and false negatives. Integrated directly into the loan processing workflow, it provides a probability score, the model’s decision, and then routes the application for final human verification—streamlining decision-making and reducing processing time.

title: StockMarket Automation
description: Developed an intelligent stock trading system combining rule-based algorithms with machine learning models to automate buy/sell decisions based on market trends and multiple financial indicators. Leveraging the SAX model alongside domain-specific stock market expertise, the system significantly reduced manual trading efforts, improved decision-making speed, and increased revenue for the client.

title: TT Webstie
description: Revamped the website for TT Sports Academy, a multi-sport facility offering badminton, yoga, boxing, swimming, and more. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, the redesign focused on boosting SEO from ~55% to 100% and improving best practices to 100%, significantly enhancing brand visibility and online credibility. Performance scores improved from 40% to 73%, making the site faster, more discoverable, and more engaging for potential members.

title: Techiegen Edtech PWA
description: Built a meme-based learning platform as a Progressive Web App (PWA) for Techiegen, enabling students to learn academic concepts through humor and community interaction. Powered by Firebase on the backend, the platform was launched both as a PWA and on the Play Store, allowing rapid go-to-market testing for product validation and monetization potential. Optimized for high performance, accessibility, and SEO to maximize reach and engagement.

title: Temple Billing System
description: Developed a high-performance desktop billing and ticket management system for a temple, upgrading their existing software with advanced features like stock management, daily revenue and expense tracking, and interactive dashboards. Built using Tauri, Rust, and Firebase, the solution drastically reduced paper usage to 0% by fully digitizing records, while delivering lightning-fast load times and improved operational efficiency.

title: Data Analysis Tool
description: Built a no-code data analysis and predictive modeling platform for users with strong statistical knowledge but no programming experience. The tool allows users to upload CSV datasets, generate interactive charts and graphs, and build basic machine learning models such as linear regression and logistic regression directly through a user-friendly interface. Developed with React and Flask, the platform streamlines data exploration and modeling for rapid insights.

title: ColorCoding Tool
description: Developed a computer vision-based chemical analysis tool to predict methanol and ethanol percentages in solutions using image uploads. Designed for professionals in chemistry, food safety, and quality control, the tool replaced expensive lab-based equipment with a cost-effective, fast, and highly accurate alternative. Achieved 93%+ prediction accuracy with results generated in under 3 seconds, making it a practical solution for real-world industrial applications.
